name: TemperatureConverter
0:
”Alexa, ask Temperature Converter what's the temperature in Celsius for 32 degrees Fahrenheit”
”Alexa, ask Temperature Converter to tell me the temperature in Fahrenheit for 100 degrees C”
”Alexa, ask Temperature Converter to tell me the temperature in Celsius for 450 degrees Fahrenheit”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: temperature converter
des:
Temperature Converter is a handy tool for converting temperatures between American standard units and British standard units. It can be used to convert temperatures in scientific labs, cooking, weather, and many other applications.

Developed by Mira Baliga, computer science student at the University of Maryland College Park: www.mirabaliga.com

Like this app? Give it a star over on GitHub! https://github.com/mirabaliga/FahrenheitToCelsius
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
